MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L9 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Willowdale Road, Larchdale Grove, Firdale Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:54pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:30pm on 10th March 2021.
